column2: VIP Gold chat: Twin Cities unrest vaccine inquest border distress and your requests! - Replay
column5: Don’t miss today’s tremendous live interactive VIP Gold chat at 3:30 pm ET with Townhall’s Matt Vespa and HotAir’s Ed Morrissey! The duo will take VIP Gold members’ questions and comments and give an in-depth analysis of the top topics of the day. Matt has his sharp-eyed focus on the Beltway and the news from the Biden administration and Ed keeps pace with developments abroad at home and at the local level as well. We’ll have plenty to discuss and lots of time to take your questions. The hot topics include: With all the fast-moving developments our VIP Gold members can get the latest as it happens from Matt and Ed.
